content.question: In which of the following ways did monarchs in the 1400s and 1500s seek to create more centralized states?

choices.label: By curbing the traditional power of the nobility to administer justice
By redistributing land to poor peasants
By encouraging the expansion of militias and local defense forces

content.answer: By curbing the traditional power of the nobility to administer justice

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
